AboutPage.description: After years of honing my skills as a technical manager and designer, I finally let myself be captivated by programming. Writing code brings me joy. I love fixing stubborn bugs and experiencing those magical moments of enlightenment when, after hours of debugging, I manage to write that one line that makes the code work 😉 Currently, I am focusing on developing programming skills in JavaScript and React/Next.js. It's a fascinating environment that gives me the opportunity to create interactive and dynamic web applications. I'm delighted to expand my knowledge and gain experience in the coding world.

ProjectsPage.heading: Latest projects
ProjectsPage.placeForFamily: Place for Family is a web application designed to provide a space for families to organize and plan activities based on weather conditions. Users can sign up, create their family profiles, and add custom options for different weather scenarios.
ProjectsPage.hooBank: Hoobank is a web application that provides modern and efficient banking solutions. This project is built using React and Vite, offering a seamless development experience.
ProjectsPage.bestShop: Welcome to Best Shop Project! This is a revolutionary application that simplifies complex tasks and enhances your productivity. Whether you're a developer, designer, or someone looking for an efficient solution, Awesome Project has got you covered.
ProjectsPage.toDo: React: JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Firebase: SDK for building web applications with real-time database functionality. Vite: Fast build tool that enhances development experience for React applications.
ProjectsPage.gpt3: This project is a React-based web application that showcases the capabilities of OpenAI's GPT-3. The application includes various sections such as information about GPT-3, features, case studies, a blog, and more.
ProjectsPage.gerichtRestaurant: Gerich restaurant is built with a responsive design, ensuring a seamless experience across various devices. The user interface is designed with simplicity in mind, making it easy for users to navigate and perform actions.

ContactPage.text-3: I love making new connections with people.
ContactPage.text-4: Feel free to drop me an email.
